archiefmat.titel: Ingekomen stukken bij de landdrost van Nickerie
archiefmat.titel_eng: Documents sent to the bailiff of Nickerie
archiefmat.scope: Contains letters and papers received from the Governor/Governor-General and other authorities in Paramaribo and from authorities and private persons in Nickerie.  Among other things Subjects regard contacts with the Amerindian population, desertion of slaves, treatment of slaves, resistance of slaves, administration of justice, public order, militia, public health etc. Letters from authorities in Paramaribo are partly informative (general rules and regulations), partly in reaction to correspondence from Nickerie.
